dict:type.dict:name: Credit Course
dict:type.dict:desc: A course offered for academic credit

dict:type.dict:name: Credit Course Format Shell
dict:type.dict:desc: This is really just a container to attach the activities for a given course format (each credit course can have multiple course formats each with a set of activities)

dict:type.dict:name: Program
dict:type.dict:desc: A non-specific program used for grouping

dict:type.dict:name: All Activity Types
dict:type.dict:desc: All of these types of activities: Lecture, Lab, Discussion, etc.

dict:type.dict:name: Lab
dict:type.dict:desc: Student working on projects in a defined laboratory space. Instructors are on-hand for students to ask questions and guidance.

dict:type.dict:name: Discussion
dict:type.dict:desc: The exchange of opinions or questions on course material

dict:type.dict:name: Tutorial
dict:type.dict:desc: Supplementary (or remedial) individualized instruction, Extra meetings for the review or elaboration of course materials

dict:type.dict:name: Web Lecture
dict:type.dict:desc: Web-based or technologically-mediated activities replacing standard lectures

dict:type.dict:name: Web Discuss
dict:type.dict:desc: Web-based or technologically-mediated activities replacing standard discussion sections

dict:type.dict:name: Directed
dict:type.dict:desc: Provides students with a way to complete a class or other area of focussed studies. Directed study may be individualized method or in a group.

dict:type.dict:name: Official
dict:type.dict:desc: This identifier holds the official identifier for this course

dict:type.dict:name: Cross-listed
dict:type.dict:desc: This identifier holds the cross-listed identifiers for this course

dict:type.dict:name: Version
dict:type.dict:desc: This identifier holds the version information for courses that have multiple versions
